column122: All applicants regardless of program automatically considered. Awarded by faculty based on student's audition (performance applicants) or interview (all other majors). Only full-time undergraduate students entering in fall semester considered. Awards not reviewed for increases in subsequent years. Renewable for length of program. Students adding second major or changing majors after beginning classes not eligible for scholarship beyond fourth year. Need-based grant funding available through FAFSA (filing deadline February 15).
